column5: Great report guys.. Hummm may need to fire up the old heater and head out
Great report... We were out there yestereday (Tony, Emilio and I) and the bite was hot until 11:45am and then it just died!! Very finicky!!!

Great report and pics Joey!!!   Too bad about the fish, sometimes ya gotta give the little ones the sore-mouth so the big fat lazy ones can get around to bitin'.  All those people so close yet so far! Somebody needs to set up an OFC flag or banner to attract attention... maybe fire off a couple flares or something!
That is so cool.  Post pictures on the interwebs to see where your fishing buddies were today.  Great report, Joanne, making me itch to hit that hardwater.
most people see the ATV and know it me but we need to take marine radios or gmrs radios so we can find everyone
Great stuff folks, but how thick was that ice?  If I had seen what's in that first pic I likely would have turned around   Is it 12" yet?  Maureen
Mo, it was 4 to 5 inches most places.  Joey
Great to see you out there having a good time!
